name: Hero's Fortune
descriptionText: Even at the start of your career, it was clear that you had a chance at greatness, and your legend continues to grow with every adventure.
benefitText: You gain a hero point. The maximum number of hero points you can have at any one time is increased to 5.
normalText: You can have no more than 3 hero points at one time.
specialText: NPCs who take this feat receive 1 hero point and can have up to 3 (not 5).
